{{cpp/title|setiosflags}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iomanip|
/*unspecified*/ setiosflags( std::ios_base::fmtflags mask );
}}

When used in an expression {{c|out &lt;&lt; setiosflags(mask)}} or {{c|in &gt;&gt; setiosflags(mask)}}, sets all format flags of the stream {{c|out}} or {{c|in}} as specified by the {{c|mask}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|mask|bitmask of the flags to set}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{cpp/io/manip/iomanip return value|setiosflags}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::resetiosflags(std::ios_base::dec) 
              &lt;&lt; std::setiosflags(  std::ios_base::hex
                                  {{!}} std::ios_base::uppercase
                                  {{!}} std::ios_base::showbase) &lt;&lt; 42 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0X2A
}}
